selections.name: Bivacco
selections.reason: Strong recent form with a 2nd at this track and distance. Coming off a solid 4th at Gosford in a Super Maiden. Looks the one to beat in this company.

selections.name: Wild Romeo
selections.reason: Showed ability when 2nd at Albury two starts back. Drawn the rail and should be competitive.

selections.name: Xceptional Spirit
selections.reason: 2yo filly taking on older horses but won a recent trial at Goulburn. Market watch advised.

selections.name: Show Rhythm
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Trialled okay at Goulburn. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Wild Romeo
danger_horse.reason: Has the rail advantage and previous form suggests he can challenge the favorite.

selections.name: Hammurabi
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from Provincial (Wyong/Gosford) maidens to Country level. Ratings are superior.

selections.name: Redolent
selections.reason: Solid 4th resuming at this track. Will strip fitter and Scone form prior was decent.

selections.name: Red Light Rachel
selections.reason: Showed good speed on debut to finish 3rd at this track. Improver.

selections.name: Silver Touch
selections.reason: Resuming. Only career start was a 2nd at this track. Trialled well.

danger_horse.name: Redolent
danger_horse.reason: Fitter for the first-up run and drawn well to challenge.

selections.name: Falcon Lair
selections.reason: Excellent 3rd at this track last start. Ideally placed to break through.

selections.name: Brazen Crime
selections.reason: Won at Wagga two back, then faced tougher Highway company. Drops back to suitable grade.

selections.name: Star Bling
selections.reason: Last start winner at Sapphire Coast. In good form.

selections.name: Ceremonious
selections.reason: Won at Cowra two back. Failed last start but capable of bouncing back.

danger_horse.name: Brazen Crime
danger_horse.reason: Class dropper with the inside gate.

selections.name: Aristocrat
selections.reason: Standout in a heavily scratched field. 2nd at Nowra last start and consistent form.

selections.name: Rule Of Faith
selections.reason: 3rd at Newcastle last start. That form line is strong for this depleted field.

selections.name: Hard Grunt
selections.reason: Placed 3rd at this track last start. Honest runner.

selections.name: Little Rascal
selections.reason: Needs to improve but makes the numbers in a small field.

danger_horse.name: Rule Of Faith
danger_horse.reason: Provincial form stacks up well here.

selections.name: Zoufield
selections.reason: Waterhouse/Bott runner who won impressively at Newcastle last campaign. Trialled well.

selections.name: Triptolemus
selections.reason: Won at Wagga resuming. Fitter and looks the main danger.

selections.name: Cashbook
selections.reason: Drops in class from a Rosehill Highway handicap. 3rd at Sapphire Coast last start.

selections.name: Spread The Love
selections.reason: Resuming. Won maiden at Goulburn before spell. Trial winner.

danger_horse.name: Triptolemus
danger_horse.reason: In winning form and drawn well.

selections.name: Bar Jester
selections.reason: Won on debut at this track beating Music Time. Drawn the rail to repeat.

selections.name: Music Time
selections.reason: 2nd to Bar Jester then won at this track. Clear second pick.

selections.name: La Stiava
selections.reason: 2nd to Music Time last start. Consistent form line.

selections.name: Somerford
selections.reason: First starter with solid trial form. Watch betting.

danger_horse.name: Music Time
danger_horse.reason: Proven winner at the track and the main rival to the top pick.

selections.name: Captain Fenkel
selections.reason: Drops massively in grade from BM78/BM72 city races. 5th at Canterbury last start is superior form.

selections.name: Burgundy Girl
selections.reason: Last start winner at Sapphire Coast. Proven at this level.

selections.name: Scarli Japali
selections.reason: 4th in a BM72 at Canterbury recently. Class runner.

selections.name: Good Prize
selections.reason: 7th in the Bega Cup. Will appreciate the drop in depth here.

selections.name: Cliff House
selections.reason: Resuming. Has high class ability (BM94 level previously). Big weight but class prevails.

selections.name: Ringarosa
selections.reason: 7th in BM78 company last start. Well placed here.

selections.name: My Last Hooray
selections.reason: Good second-up record. 7th resuming but will improve.

selections.name: Chasing A Quid
selections.reason: 3rd at this track last start. Consistent.

danger_horse.name: Ringarosa
danger_horse.reason: City form stacks up well in this Federal Sprint.

selections.name: Shyamalan
selections.reason: Resuming for new stable. Victorian form was competitive. Drawn the rail.

selections.name: Too Darn Sassy
selections.reason: 6th last start but 2nd prior. Light weight gives her a chance.

selections.name: Our Little Star
selections.reason: Consistent type. 4th last start at Goulburn.

selections.name: Vinari
selections.reason: 7th last start but capable of improvement in this open field.

danger_horse.name: Too Darn Sassy
danger_horse.reason: Light weight and previous form puts her in the mix.
